name: The Real World
description: THE REAL WORLD (TRW) is a theme meme coin designed to offer the benefits that other meme coins don’t give to their community. It offers blockchain gaming and entertaining NFTs based on the Binance Smart Chain, developing a decentralized community and ecosystem. It is the only meme token capable of blowing its competition away and walking over. THE REAL WORLD (TRW) is more than just a token. It is a movement driven by new memes in the crypto space. This community-driven token focuses on making rags into riches, transforming past mistakes into future gains. THE REAL WORLD (TRW) embodies the true spirit of meme resilience and laughter. We‘re here to prove that laughter can make you rich, unlike other memes.
